Increase velocity when passing another runner on the outside toward the back on the final straight.
Hishi Amazon (Original)'s unique

name: Lights of Vaudeville
effect:
Greatly increase velocity with a dazzling display when just breaking out of the pack toward the front on the final straight.
Fuji Kiseki (Original)'s unique

name: KEEP IT REAL.
effect:
Moderately increase acceleration steadily with a captivating performance when starting to make a move from midpack in the second half of the race.
Gold City (Original)'s unique

name: A Kiss for Courage
effect:
Increase velocity with an enthusiastic "Lets go!" when positioned toward the front in the second half of the race after recovering endurance with a skill.
Maruzensky (Summer)'s unique

name: I Never Goof Up!
effect:
Aim for the front with unwavering determination when passing another runner from midpack or further back on a corner late-race.
Meisho Doto (Original)'s unique

name: Schwarzes Schwert
effect:
Increase velocity in a dash for the lead after running calmly and according to plan up until the final straight.
Eishin Flash (Original)'s unique

name: Bountiful Harvest
effect:
Increase velocity with a surge of great fortune when pressured by another runner toward the back in the second half of the race.
